title: Be racist Riot doesn't care anymore

embed.description: Post with 0 views. Fuck riot for this

body:
First of all i got banned immediately twice for saying the word %%%%%% one time. As i was Q'ing up for the next game i was gone.

This guy, on the other hand, said Ni***r in champ select and then spammed it throughout the entire game. HE STILL NOT BANNED 

FUCK RIOT FOR THIS SHIT

replies.body:
A: how are you determining that they are not banned/restricted?

B: did anyone report them?

I did... and dude is still play

It would be complete bullshit if he can keep playing while spamming the n word and i got banned for saying f**got
How do you know he didnt just got a chat suspension?

The n-word is a zero-tolerance term and usually immediately followed by a 14-day suspension.

If he didn't get banned, either he hasn't actually been reported or the system didn't detect it correctly.
dude i got banned for saying Fa**ot  right after the game ended. he should get the same treatment instead of a chat restriction.
You said homophobic word which is 100% 14 days ban , did he said this word too? Sorry for some reason i cant open the picture. If he said something else maybe he got chat restriction etc..

SO YOU FUCKING MEAN SAYING A WORD THAT WAS CREATED FOR PEOPLE OF A CERTAIN SKIN COLOR DOESN'T CARRY THE SAME WEIGHT AS THAT STUPID WORD?
ARE YOU SERIOUS???
Because he used a lowercase L instead of a lowercase I
no, the system is good at detecting that.

it's not, I had someone do the same thing to me and they weren't banned. Copied and pasted their message in post lobby because it looked off and sure enough it was the lowercase L
Personally I'd write a ticket to support and hopefully that triggers something
He should get banned but sometimes Riot doesn't pick up these cases. Some of my league friends have said it and nothing has happened its really weird.

Sometimes people get away with it. I said stfu followed by a homophobic slur once in an aram and never got punished. Idk if anyone reported it though. Dont expect perfection from human creations. We kinda suck at perfection.
